mapper.sql: PARTY_ID, PARTY_NUM, PARTY_TYPE_CD, PARTY_NAME, ECIF_PARTY_NUM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, EXAMINE_STATE, CUST_PROPERTY_STATUS, IF_DATA_MOVE, IS_POTENTIAL_CUST, LEG_ORG

PARTY_ID, PARTY_NAME, ENGLISH_NAME, CHINESE_SHORT_NAME, ENGLISH_SHORT_NAME, GENDER_CD, MARRIAGE_CD, BIRTHDAY, DEGREE_CD, EDUCATION_BACKGROUD_CD, NATION, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_NUM, UPDATE_ORG_NUM, NATURAL_PERSON_TYPE_CD, WORK_UNIT, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NUM, HUKOU_PROPERTY, IS_FARMER, HUKOU_REGISTED, STREET_POLICE_STATION, HEALTH_STATE, PROFESSION, PROFESSIONAL_TITLE, ACCOUNTING_ASSISTANT, POSITION_PROPERTY, WORK_YEARS, FAMILY_NUMBER, PROVIDE_FOR_NUMBER, FAMILY_ADDRESS, HOUSE_PROPERTY, FAMILY_PHONE, PHONE_NUMBER, UNIT_ADRESS, UNIT_PHONE, INDUSTRY, INDUSTRY_DESC, JOINT_GUARANTEE, STOCKHOLDER_OF_BANK, WHETHER_BLACK_LIST, BLACK_LIST_REASON, IS_BANK_EMPLOYEE, EMPLOYEE_GRADE, IS_SAMLL_LOAND_EMP, COUNTRY_SIGN, IS_BASEBANK_RELA_CUST, IS_THIRD_CUST, THIRD_CUST_TYPE_CD, MIDDLE_CODE, WEIXIN_NUM, COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS, COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS_CODE, LIVE_ADDRESS_CODE, EMAIL, UNIT_ADDRESS_CODE, ANNUALSALARY, RESDNT_CHAR_CD, SCH_NAME, CERT_CREATE_DATE, CERT_END_DATE, IFCERTIFICATE, NATIFLAG, NATURE_OF_UNIT, SCALE_OF_UNIT, FLG_SMS, CUST_TYPE
mapper.select:
SELECT distinct t1.PARTY_ID, t1.PARTY_NUM, t1.PARTY_NAME, np.CERT_TYPE, np.CERT_NUM, np.MIDDLE_CODE, t5.GENERAL_ADJUST_RATING_CD as XF_CREDIT_RATING_CD, t6.GENERAL_ADJUST_RATING_CD as JY_CREDIT_RATING_CD, t1.PARTY_TYPE_CD, t1.USER_NUM, t1.org_num, biz.credit_amt as pf_amt, biz.used_amt_real as pf_balance, oo.leg_org FROM TB_CSM_NATURAL_PERSON np left join TB_IRM_INTERNAL_RATING_APPLY t5 on np.party_id = t5.party_id and t5.RATING_STATE = '03' and t5.rating_type='1' left join TB_IRM_INTERNAL_RATING_APPLY t6 on np.party_id = t6.party_id and t6.RATING_STATE = '03' and t6.rating_type='2' left join v_crd_party_limit biz on biz.party_id=np.party_id , V_CSM_PARTY t1,om_organization oo where t1.party_id = np.party_id and t1.is_potential_cust = '1' and t1.examine_state='3' and t1.party_id not in (select t.party_id from tb_csm_management_team t where t.user_num =#userNum# and t.org_num=#orgNum#) and oo.leg_org = ( select leg_org from om_organization where orgcode=#orgNum#)
and t1.PARTY_NAME like '%$partyName$%'
and np.CERT_TYPE =#certType#
and np.CERT_NUM =#certNum#
and np.CERT_NUM =#middelCode#

SELECT t1.PARTY_ID, t1.PARTY_NUM, t1.PARTY_NAME, np.CERT_TYPE, np.CERT_NUM, np.MIDDLE_CODE, t5.GENERAL_ADJUST_RATING_CD as CREDIT_RATING_CD, t1.PARTY_TYPE_CD, ct.USER_NUM, biz.pf_amt, biz.pf_balance FROM TB_CSM_NATURAL_PERSON np left join TB_IRM_INTERNAL_RATING_APPLY t5 on np.party_id = t5.party_id and t5.RATING_STATE = '03' left join tb_csm_management_team ct on np.party_id = ct.party_id and ct.user_placing_cd='01' left join (select tb.party_id, sum(tb.CREDIT_AMOUNT) as pf_amt, sum(tb.CREDIT_AVI) as pf_balance from tb_biz_approve ta, tb_biz_amount_approve tb where ta.APPROVE_ID = tb.APPROVE_ID and ta.become_effective_mark in ('03', '05') and ta.approve_conclusion in ('1', '3') group by tb.party_id)biz on biz.party_id=np.party_id , TB_CSM_PARTY t1 where t1.party_id = np.party_id and np.natural_person_type_cd in ('2', '3') and t1.is_potential_cust = '1' and t1.examine_state='3'
and t1.PARTY_ID in (select party_id from tb_csm_management_team where user_num=#curUserNum# and org_num=#orgcode# )
and t1.PARTY_NAME like '%$partyName$%'
and np.CERT_TYPE =#certType#
and np.CERT_NUM =#certNum#
and np.CERT_NUM =#middelCode#
mapper.update:
update TB_CSM_NATURAL_PERSON
PARTY_NAME = #{partyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENGLISH_NAME = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESE_SHORT_NAME = #{chineseShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENGLISH_SHORT_NAME = #{englishShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER_CD = #{genderCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARRIAGE_CD = #{marriageCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEGREE_CD = #{degreeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATION_BACKGROUD_CD = #{educationBackgroudCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER_NUM = #{updateUserNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_ORG_NUM = #{updateOrgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATURAL_PERSON_TYPE_CD = #{naturalPersonTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_UNIT = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NUM = #{certNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HUKOU_PROPERTY = #{hukouProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FARMER = #{isFarmer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HUKOU_REGISTED = #{hukouRegisted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STREET_POLICE_STATION = #{streetPoliceStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEALTH_STATE = #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSIONAL_TITLE = #{professionalTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNTING_ASSISTANT = #{accountingAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_PROPERTY = #{positionProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_YEARS = #{workYears,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAMILY_NUMBER = #{familyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDE_FOR_NUMBER = #{provideForNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAMILY_ADDRESS = #{familyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSE_PROPERTY = #{houseProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAMILY_PHONE = #{familyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_ADRESS = #{unitAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PHONE = #{unitPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_DESC = #{industryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOINT_GUARANTEE = #{jointGuarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCKHOLDER_OF_BANK = #{stockholderOfBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHETHER_BLACK_LIST = #{whetherBlackList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLACK_LIST_REASON = #{blackListReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_BANK_EMPLOYEE = #{isBankEmployee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_GRADE = #{employeeGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SAMLL_LOAND_EMP = #{isSamllLoandEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY_SIGN = #{countrySign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_BASEBANK_RELA_CUST = #{isBasebankRelaCust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_THIRD_CUST = #{isThirdCust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THIRD_CUST_TYPE_CD = #{thirdCustTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIDDLE_CODE = #{middleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIXIN_NUM = #{weixinNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS = #{communicationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS_CODE = #{communicationAddressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIVE_ADDRESS_CODE = #{liveAddressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_ADDRESS_CODE = #{unitAddressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNUALSALARY = #{annualsalary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESDNT_CHAR_CD = #{resdntCharCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCH_NAME = #{schName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_CREATE_DATE = #{certCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CERT_END_DATE = #{certEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IFCERTIFICATE = #{ifcertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIFLAG = #{natiflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATURE_OF_UNIT = #{natureOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCALE_OF_UNIT = #{scaleOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLG_SMS = #{flgSms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
